InitialFeedbackHistory:
26/07/2022
2. Data: are you also generating some datasets, analysis codes/ script or documents generated by analyzing the data? 
3. Personal data: Please list the PRET approval number (G-...-2022)
3. 3rd party restrictions: you mention restrictions under 7, please also explain those here, did you receive the data with a data transfer engagement or do they have a licence? 
6. Storage: storing data on external disks is risky, is there a specific reason to use these, otherwise see https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/nl for more sustainable alternatives.  
7. Sharing: Do you already know which repositories to use? If there is no suitable disciplinary repository please note that KU Leuven now also has a data repository RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr), for code you can use KU Leuven gitlab (https://gitlab.kuleuven.be/).
label: good with suggestions
